snippet.title: Shatter Remastered Deluxe - Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Shatter Remastered Deluxe will launch for Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5|4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and Windows PC, macOS, and Steam Deck via Steam on Nov. 2, 2022.

Relive the award-winning classic that redefined a genre. Shatter returns in stunning 4K resolution running at 120fps, with a modernized UI, and multiple VFX improvements. Re-experience the highly acclaimed original soundtrack, remixed and remastered in 5.1 surround sound. 

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1937230/Shatter_Remastered_Deluxe/

Pre-order now on Nintendo Switch:
https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/shatter-remastered-deluxe-switch/

Website: http://www.shattergame.com/
